dict.acceptation: 开幕，开始；空缺的职位；[商]开盘，交易开始时间；（职位的）空缺；
（打）开( open的现在分词)；开始；睁开；启动；

sent.orig: The opening rate droped 26.14 %. The method decreased the opening rate of apple pear effectively.
sent.trans: 该法的裂口率比对照下降了26.14%，有效地降低了苹果梨的裂果率。

sent.orig: This sentence as part of its new Mercedes-Benz cars for the opening of opening remarks.
sent.trans: 这句话作为其为新款奔驰车揭幕时的开场白。

sent.orig: The separation of the sphere-creates an oval opening-the vesica pisces-opening in the penis-shape of the eye.
sent.trans: 球的分离-创造了一椭圆口-两端尖的椭圆形-阴茎的开口-眼睛形状。

sent.orig: The Authorization for Account Opening, Account Opening Information, Schedules and the Agreement form one composite agreement.
sent.trans: 本协议书所指的开户授权书，开户资料及附录为本协议书的整体部份。

sent.orig: Refrigerate after opening. Use within 2-3 days after opening.
sent.trans: 开瓶后冰箱冷藏，并于2-3天内吃完。
